# Interface: User

Represents a user in Cobrowse.

## Hierarchy

- `EventEmitter`

  ↳ **`User`**

## Properties

### id

• **id**: `string`

## Methods

### on

▸ **on**(`event`, `listener`): [`User`](User.md)

Listen for events on this user.

#### Parameters

| Name | Type |
| :------ | :------ |
| `event` | ``"updated"`` |
| `listener` | (`user`: [`User`](User.md)) => `void` |

#### Returns

[`User`](User.md)

#### Overrides

EventEmitter.on

___

### toJSON

▸ **toJSON**(): [`User`](User.md)

Converts this device instance to a plain object.

#### Returns

[`User`](User.md)
